text: [Ej mardum] Ust, ki sumoro az jak tan ofarid va hamsarasro az u padid ovard, to dar kanoras orom girad. Pas, cun [Odam] ʙo vaj [Havo] daromext, ʙordor sud – ʙori saʙuk – va [naxustin mohhoi ʙordoriro] guzarond va cun sanginʙor sud, Alloh taolo – Parvardigori xudro xondand, ki: «Agar ʙa mo [farzandi tandurustu] soista ato kuni, hatman, siposguzor xohem ʙud»
